sentences.en: Although most condoms contain spermicide, there are some manufactured without.
sentences.cn: 虽然多数避孕套含有杀精剂，但也有一些是不含的。

sentences.en: Dehydrated meals, soups and sauces contain a lot of salt.
sentences.cn: 脱水后的饭菜、汤和调味料中含有很多盐分。

sentences.en: He was unable to contain his own destructive feelings.
sentences.cn: 他无法抑制自己消极的情绪。

sentences.en: It might contain something of value.
sentences.cn: 它里面也许还有什么值钱的东西。

sentences.en: Jane couldn’t contain her amusement any longer.
Milk, oily fish and egg all contain vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 牛奶、油性鱼类和鸡蛋都含有维生素D.
每100克橙子仅含35卡的热量。

sentences.en: Our range of herbal teas contain no preservatives, colourings or artificial flavourings.
sentences.cn: 我们这一系列的药草茶不含防腐剂、色素以及人工调味品。

sentences.en: Seven fire brigades were deployed to contain the blaze.
She bought a travel-bag large enough to contain the film canisters.
sentences.cn: 她买了一只能装得下那些胶卷筒的旅行包。

sentences.en: Some mushrooms contain a deadly poison.
sentences.cn: 有些蘑菇含有致命毒素。

sentences.en: The letter contained information about Boulestin’s legal affairs.
sentences.cn: 这封信里有关于布莱斯坦的法律事务的信息。

sentences.en: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.cn: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

sentences.en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentences.cn: 子女身上遗传了父母双方的基因型板。

sentences.en: The problem was that the exhaust gases contain many toxins.
sentences.cn: 问题在于废气中含有很多毒素。

sentences.en: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.cn: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.en: The two discs also contain two of Britten's lesser-known song-cycles.
sentences.cn: 这两张唱片还包含了布里顿两首不甚知名的声乐套曲。

sentences.en: These reports clearly contain elements of propaganda.
sentences.cn: 这些报告明显带有一些宣传的意味。

sentences.en: This drink doesn't contain any alcohol.
sentences.cn: 这种饮料不含任何酒精。

words.tran_cn: 泰然自若的，从容的；被控制的
包含；遏制（contain的过去分词）；容纳

trans.tran_cn: 装有，包含，遏制，控制，克制
trans.tran_en: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

trans.tran_cn: 包含， 容纳； 装有； 控制， 抑制
trans.tran_en: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it
